p:
Local BLAST using reported FIPs (
Supplementary Table S1 ) against M. conica SH genome (NCBI Sequencing program VOVZ00000000) revealed one predicted protein (scaffold3t326) with significant sequence similarity to ACA (percent identity: 50%) ( 16) and YZP (percent identity: 41.6%) ( 39). This predicted protein, FIP-mco, consisted of 133 amino acid residues with a calculated molecular weight of 13.57 kDa and an isoelectric point (pI) of 4.53. The amino acid composition of FIP-mco lacks His and Met but is rich in Ala, Thr, and Val residues, which is similar to the typical FIP sequence characteristics ( 6).
